name: Tahm Kench
title: The River King
shortBio: Known by many names throughout history, the demon Tahm Kench travels the waterways of Runeterra, feeding his insatiable appetite with the misery of others. Though he may appear singularly charming and proud, he swaggers through the physical realm like a vagabond in search of unsuspecting prey. His lashing tongue can stun even a heavily armored warrior from a dozen paces, and to fall into his rumbling belly is to tumble into an abyss from which there is little hope of return.

skins.name: Master Chef Tahm Kench
skins.description: He's the sushi singer, the loquacious pescatarian, the big catfish with a big fish dish. He'll prep you a meal, then cut you a deal. Here comes Taaaaaaahm Kench!

skins.name: Coin Emperor Tahm Kench

chromas.name: Coin Emperor Tahm Kench

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

skins.description: Craving the smell of coins over all other earthly delights, Tahm Kench rises from his river kingdom each Lunar Revel, seeking to barter with mortals. Though his targets are almost always left destitute, with the proper reverence and careful wording it is possible to escape his bargains unimaginably wealthy.

skins.name: Arcana Tahm Kench

chromas.name: Arcana Tahm Kench

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: The epitome of power and opulence, Tahm Kench's power drips from his tongue. Its ornate patterns captivate and cajole his listeners. He leverages those he rules, staking his power to ensure the patterns always shift in his favor—“correcting” his subjects who have gone astray.

skins.name: High Noon Tahm Kench

chromas.name: High Noon Tahm Kench

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: High Noon Tahm Kench

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

skins.description: Tahm Kench is a magnanimous devil: happy to lend a magical sword to a lady in need, or to assist her in robbing the Sulfur Rail, or even to deliver her to a calamitous destiny as a fellow Harbinger of the End Times. He don't need no compensation. She'll just owe him a favor… because in the End, it pays to have friends.

skins.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Tahm Kench

chromas.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Tahm Kench

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Once a catfish, Tahm Kench dreamed of becoming a dragon. Upon Jhin's release from his waterfall prison, a magical pearl was unearthed at its base, catching both Tahm's and Kog'Maw's eyes. Snatching it first, Tahm transformed into a dragon god of currents and unleashed a maelstrom of startling ferocity, laughing at the ensuing destruction.

passive.name: An Acquired Taste
passive.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of <spellName>An Acquired Taste</spellName>. At three stacks, he can use <spellName>Devour</spellName> on an enemy champion.

spells.name: Tongue Lash
spells.description:
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.

Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slows them by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

On champion hit, heals Tahm for @BaseHeal@ +@PercentHealthHealing*100@% of his missing Health and applies a stack of An Acquired Taste dealing @Spell.TahmKenchPassive:TotalDamage@ extra magic damage. If that champion already had 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they will also be Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds, consuming the stacks.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour enemy champions who already have 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste from a distance when you hit them.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Abyssal Dive
spells.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Dive down and then re-appear at target location, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage and Knock Up all enemies in an area for @KnockupDuration@ second. Hitting at least one enemy champion refunds @ChampRefund*100@% of the Cooldown and Mana cost.

Devoured allies can be taken along for the ride (but can always hop out early).@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Thick Skin
spells.description:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.

Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: @GreyHealthRatio*100@% of damage Tahm Kench takes is stored by his Thick Skin, increased to @GreyHealthRatioEnhanced*100@% if there are at least @EnhancedThreshold@ nearby enemy champions. If Kench has not taken damage within @OOCTimer@ seconds, Thick Skin will rapidly be consumed to heal Tahm for @GreyHealthHealingRatio@ of its value.

Active: Convert all your stored Thick Skin into a Shield, lasting @ShieldDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Devour
spells.description: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds. He can Recast to spit them out.

Enemy Champions: Require 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste. Are devoured for up to @EnemyDuration@ seconds and take @BaseDamage@ (+@PercentHPDamage@ of their Max Health) magic damage. Tahm Kench is Slowed by @SlowAmount*100@% and Grounded during this effect.

Ally Champions: Are devoured for up to @AllyDuration@ seconds and are granted @TotalShield@ Shield which decays gradually after being spit out. Allies can also choose to exit early. Tahm Kench is Grounded during this effect, but can cast Abyssal Dive and gains @AllySpeedAmount*100@% Move Speed for @AllyDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
